name: Planet of Mubu
description: «Planet of Mubu» is a top-down shooter with elements of puzzle and runner in the green alien civilization setting. The combination of challenging puzzles and crazy shootouts will not let you get bored, and high-speed races will diversify your gameplay.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8 Processor: 1.2 Ghz+ Memory: 1024 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 50 MB available space Additional Notes: Mouse and keyboard
